ValidationRule.description: For Canada, Closed Opportunities should not be changed (other than Close Reason).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Data Integrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "CA_Salesforce_Admin"), BEGINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'CA_'), OR(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Closed - Complete'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed - Complete')), OR( ISCHANGED( AccountId ), ISCHANGED( Amount ) , ISCHANGED( Benefit_Prior_Auth_Denied_or_Approved__c ), ISCHANGED( Benefit_Authorization_Number__c ), ISCHANGED( Benefit_Auth_End_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( Benefit_Auth_Start_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( Benefit__c ) , ISCHANGED( CA_Benefit_Plan_Year_Type__c ) , ISCHANGED( Competitor__c ) , ISCHANGED( Cash_Pay__c ), ISCHANGED( Medical_Facility__c ), ISCHANGED( CurrencyIsoCode ), ISCHANGED( Name ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , ISCHANGED( Prescriber__c ), ISCHANGED(Country__c), ISCHANGED( Parent_Opportunity__c ), /*ISCHANGED( CloseDate ),*/
ISCHANGED( Type ), ISCHANGED( High_Priority__c ), ISCHANGED(CA_Other_Authorization_Details__c) , ISCHANGED(Sensor_Max__c), ISCHANGED(Transmitter_Max__c), ISCHANGED(Receiver_Max__c), ISCHANGED(Receiver_Max_Qty__c), ISCHANGED(Benefit_Coverage__c), ISCHANGED(Benefit_Co_Pay__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closed Opportunities can not be changed
